title: The blog in his eye
author: VD
content_html:
AG writes: Still no luck on the random slides in Impress. I am thinking that perhaps the functionality I need to use has not been written into Impress yet. This functionality would be the ability to select a slide, cut the slide, select another slide or spot between slides, and paste the cut slide there. All I have found so far is the function of selecting a slide and “remove”ing it, but no way to paste it anywhere.

AG is the latest addition to the Reader Blogroll. He’s also working on a macro to provide the ability to do slide show randomization in OpenOffice Impress. He’s got it partially working, but is not there yet. If anyone knows anything about this, let me know or visit The Blog in My Own Eye and fill him in directly.
content_text:
AG writes:
Still no luck on the random slides in Impress.  I am thinking that perhaps the functionality I need to use has not been written into Impress yet.  This functionality would be the ability to select a slide, cut the slide, select another slide or spot between slides, and paste the cut slide there.  All I have found so far is the function of selecting a slide and “remove”ing it, but no way to paste it anywhere.
AG is the latest addition to the Reader Blogroll.  He’s also working on a macro to provide the ability to do slide show randomization in OpenOffice Impress.  He’s got it partially working, but is not there yet.  If anyone knows anything about this, let me know or visit
The Blog in My Own Eye
and fill him in directly.
